chunks.zh: 春节回家发现农村人迷信赤脚医生
chunks.en: Discovered during Chinese New Year that rural people are superstitious about barefoot doctors.

chunks.zh:
我有皮肤病，类似于癣那种，在上海、北京的正规三甲医院都看过，说是特应性皮炎，无法根治，只能缓解。

跟家里人说了之后，就要带我去某农村卫生室的杨医生，说医术高明，很多大医院都治不好的他都能治。
chunks.en:
I have a skin condition, similar to ringworm, and have seen doctors at reputable tertiary hospitals in Shanghai and Beijing. They say it's atopic dermatitis, which is incurable and can only be relieved.

After telling my family, they wanted to take me to a Yang doctor in a rural clinic, saying that his medical skills are superb and that he can cure many conditions that large hospitals cannot.

chunks.zh: 我是不太相信的，但是碍于情面，还是跟着他们去看了，好家伙，用药很猛，每天打两针，每餐饭前、饭后各一包西药，每包有 10 粒左右的药，共 4 、5 种药丸。
chunks.en: I didn't really believe it, but out of politeness, I went with them. Goodness, the medication is very strong. I have to get two injections every day, and one packet of Western medicine before and after each meal, with about 10 pills in each packet, a total of 4 or 5 different types of pills.

chunks.zh:
需要坚持这样一周。

问题是过两天开工了，我不太想请假在村里治病，现在是进退两难，唉。

难道村镇医生真的比人家大城市医学博士牛？
chunks.en:
I need to stick to this for a week.

The problem is that I have to go back to work in a couple of days, and I don't really want to take leave to get treatment in the village. I'm in a dilemma now, sigh.

Are rural doctors really better than medical Ph.D.s in big cities?

chunks.zh: 我十分怀疑，不知道老家的人为啥这么相信赤脚医生，不去正规对县医院
chunks.en: I highly doubt it. I don't know why people in my hometown trust barefoot doctors so much and don't go to regular county hospitals.

chunks.zh: 城里医生用药见效慢是因为他们充分考虑后果。。。
chunks.en: City doctors' medications take longer to work because they fully consider the consequences...

chunks.zh: 想办法让身体自然消化病毒 遵循自然规律
chunks.en: They try to help the body naturally digest the virus and follow the laws of nature.

chunks.zh: 赤脚医生的做法就和化疗一样 拿药杀死一大片细胞 是好是坏不管 看着能走就行 吃死了 只要时间间隔久 就不是他的责任 万一隔几天真吃死了 大不了跑路
chunks.en: Barefoot doctors' approach is like chemotherapy, using medication to kill a large number of cells, regardless of whether it's good or bad, as long as you can walk. If you die from it, as long as the time interval is long, it's not their responsibility. If you really die in a few days, they can just run away.

chunks.zh: 皮肤病猛上激素一定能缓解，问题是你要不要考虑股骨头坏死的风险？
chunks.en: Aggressively using hormones for skin diseases will definitely relieve the symptoms, but do you want to consider the risk of femoral head necrosis?

chunks.zh: 连个三本医科大学都不是的大夫，狗屁的神医。
chunks.en: A doctor who didn't even graduate from a third-tier medical university is a complete quack.

chunks.zh: 赤脚医生如果有证就是合法的乡村医生，他们肯定不如大城市医生牛逼，甚至是存在一些问题，但是大城市医生肯定不会待在村里，所以留在村子里的人和留在赤脚医生属于各取所需，不去县城医院的理由就和他们不住在县城是一样的理由，可能是承担不去，可能是不习惯。
chunks.en: If a barefoot doctor has a license, they are a legal village doctor. They are definitely not as good as doctors in big cities, and there may even be some problems, but doctors in big cities will definitely not stay in the village. So, the people who stay in the village and the barefoot doctors are each taking what they need. The reason for not going to the county hospital is the same as the reason for not living in the county town, possibly because they can't afford it or aren't used to it.

chunks.zh: 所以这个事唯一的另类和别扭的其实是楼主，走出去了又没走出去，一方面不信赤脚医生，一方面又“碍于情面”让人治疗。
chunks.en: So the only unconventional and awkward thing in this matter is actually the original poster, who has gone out but not really gone out. On the one hand, they don't believe in barefoot doctors, and on the other hand, they are being treated out of 'politeness'.

chunks.zh: PS：以后楼主会成为乡亲们口中证明医生牛逼的新案例：“俺们村的零插阿波次得，北京上海大医院都没看好，也得回来找杨大夫”
chunks.en: PS: In the future, the original poster will become a new case in the mouths of the villagers to prove the doctor's awesomeness: 'Our village's [original poster's name], who couldn't be cured by big hospitals in Beijing and Shanghai, had to come back to find Doctor Yang'.

chunks.zh: 不要相信。
chunks.en: Don't believe it.

chunks.zh: 糊里糊涂生、糊里糊涂病、糊里糊涂死。
chunks.en: Born confused, sick confused, die confused.

chunks.zh: 希望大家都不要糊涂。
chunks.en: I hope everyone will not be confused.

chunks.zh: 这个我有发言权，农村医生三大法宝——抗生素，激素，止疼药
chunks.en: I have the right to speak on this. The three magic weapons of rural doctors are antibiotics, hormones, and painkillers.

chunks.zh: @0xABCD 差不多将近一年，代价是从此告别烟酒刷夜了。
chunks.en: @0xABCD It took almost a year, and the price was saying goodbye to smoking, drinking, and staying up late forever.

chunks.zh: 空总大夫说我的体制无法代谢烟酒熬夜的毒，就会从皮肤上体现出来。
chunks.en: The doctor at the Air Force General Hospital said that my body cannot metabolize the toxins from smoking, drinking, and staying up late, which will be reflected on the skin.

chunks.zh: 外敷药能做的只是帮我临时把它们摁住。
chunks.en: Topical medicine can only temporarily suppress them.

chunks.zh: 中医+自律则是从源头上解决毒的摄入。
chunks.en: Traditional Chinese medicine + self-discipline is to solve the intake of toxins from the source.

chunks.zh: 皮肤病这玩意，治表不治本是不行的。
chunks.en: With skin diseases, it is not enough to treat the symptoms without addressing the root cause.

chunks.zh: 皮肤病实际上是你内脏出问题的体表体现。
chunks.en: Skin diseases are actually a physical manifestation of problems with your internal organs.

chunks.zh: @miting0207 这个是饭后的药，饭前的药比这个还多几粒，一日三餐都要吃，也就是说，一天要吃 60+粒药，太离谱了     https://imgur.com/a/CRng9ph
chunks.en: @miting0207 This is the medicine after meals. The medicine before meals has a few more pills. I have to take it three times a day, which means I have to take 60+ pills a day, which is outrageous https://imgur.com/a/CRng9ph

chunks.zh: @miting0207 针拍不了，已经在诊所打了，没有拍照，我看到至少有半针管药，也是很多种药混在一起
chunks.en: @miting0207 I can't take a picture of the injection. I already got it at the clinic and didn't take any pictures. I saw there was at least half a syringe of medicine, which was also a mixture of many kinds of medicines.

chunks.zh: https://www.mayoclinic.org/zh-hans/diseases-conditions/atopic-dermatitis-eczema/symptoms-causes/syc-20353273 我建议 op 别吃了，风险不可控
chunks.en: https://www.mayoclinic.org/zh-hans/diseases-conditions/atopic-dermatitis-eczema/symptoms-causes/syc-20353273 I suggest the OP not take it, the risk is uncontrollable.

chunks.zh: @muxw6 某宝搜老马入和，每天坚持洗澡完再身体还是热乎的时候涂全身，现在基本没啥问题了，就是怕小孩子遗传，哎。。。
chunks.en: @muxw6 Search for '老马入和' on Taobao, insist on applying it all over the body after bathing while the body is still warm, and now there are basically no problems, just worry about hereditary issues for the children, sigh...

chunks.zh: 就是用药猛
chunks.en: They just use strong medicine.

chunks.zh: 你小心那些药，弄不好是大量的激素，乡村医生是抗拒不了激素的。
chunks.en: Be careful with those medicines. It's likely a large amount of hormones. Village doctors can't resist hormones.

chunks.zh: 赤脚医生就是抗生素猛猛给你用，效果是立竿见影，等你老了耐药性起来了发现没药用了
chunks.en: Barefoot doctors just give you a lot of antibiotics. The effect is immediate, but when you get old and develop drug resistance, you will find that there is no medicine to use.

chunks.zh: @rocmax 是一个 50 多岁的老头，那年头能上大学的肯定不会在农村呆着了🤣
chunks.en: @rocmax He's an old man in his 50s. People who could go to college in those days would definitely not stay in the countryside 🤣

chunks.zh: 赤脚医生喜欢猛药急攻，普通感冒恨不得二联三联抗生素 + 激素。
chunks.en: Barefoot doctors like to use strong medicine for quick results. For a common cold, they can't wait to use double or triple antibiotics + hormones.

chunks.zh: 赤脚医生们现在还在用安乃近，网上还有很多文盲阴谋论，说安乃近禁售是因为价格便宜效果好，资本不允许...
chunks.en: Barefoot doctors are still using aminopyrine. There are many illiterate conspiracy theories online saying that aminopyrine is banned because it is cheap and effective, and capital does not allow it...

chunks.zh: 不说说用的什么药么？
chunks.en: Won't you say what medicine you're using?

chunks.zh: @lloovve 有一粒是阿莫西林，其他的不认识，没有字
chunks.en: @lloovve One pill is amoxicillin, I don't recognize the others, there are no words.

chunks.zh: 超大量激素包治百病。
chunks.en: Super large doses of hormones cure all diseases.

chunks.zh: 后遗症可能十年会出现。
chunks.en: The sequelae may appear in ten years.

chunks.zh: 出现的时候解释为“命”。
chunks.en: When it appears, it is explained as 'fate'.

chunks.zh: 已经是成熟市场了。
chunks.en: It is already a mature market.

chunks.zh: 激素,抗生素, 止疼药,三倍剂量下去,半死都能蹦哒起来.
chunks.en: Hormones, antibiotics, painkillers, three times the dose, even half-dead people can jump around.

chunks.zh: 我也有皮肤病：现状扁平苔藓，10 多年没治好。
chunks.en: I also have a skin condition: currently lichen planus, which has not been cured for more than 10 years.

chunks.zh: 来北京空军总医院用了 10 天的外敷西药，下去了。
chunks.en: I came to the Air Force General Hospital in Beijing and used topical Western medicine for 10 days, and it went away.

chunks.zh: 空总的药是自制的。
chunks.en: The Air Force General Hospital's medicine is self-made.

chunks.zh: 市面上没有卖的。
chunks.en: It is not sold on the market.

chunks.zh: 后来复发了，空总的大夫劝我去西苑医院看看中医，外敷内调双管齐下。
chunks.en: Later, it relapsed, and the doctor at the Air Force General Hospital advised me to go to Xiyuan Hospital to see a Chinese medicine doctor, using both topical application and internal regulation.

chunks.zh: 现在痊愈了，不抽烟不喝酒不熬夜，不复发，也结婚了。
chunks.en: Now I'm cured, I don't smoke, drink, or stay up late, and it hasn't relapsed, and I'm married.

chunks.zh: 之前因为这个相亲都没人要，因为当时基本上全身都是。
chunks.en: Before, no one wanted me on blind dates because of this, because at that time it was basically all over my body.
